items.title: Automating blog deployment
items.content_html:
{ .banner-image }

Automating Blog Deployment with GitHub Actions

In this post, I'll show you how I automated the deployment of this blog using GitHub Actions. We'll cover setting up continuous integration to check markdown files and automatically deploy to GitHub Pages.

items.title: Getting started with mkdocs
items.content_html:
{ .banner-image }

Getting Started with MkDocs

MkDocs is a fantastic static site generator that's perfect for creating documentation sites and blogs. In this post, I'll share my experience setting up this blog using MkDocs and the Material theme.

Mathematics in Markdown

This post demonstrates how to use mathematical formulas in our blog posts using MathJax.
